THE VESSEL HAS THE LIBERTY TO USE MDO OR MGO FOR STARTING/STOPPING OF MAIN ENGINE, WHEN MANEUVERING IN/OUT OF PORTS/BERTHS IN SHALLOW, NARROW WATERS, CANALS, RIVERS, STRAITS, COASTAL WATERS, ADVERSE-BAD WEATHER, ROUGH SEAS, REDUCED VISIBILITY AND IN CASE OF SAFETY AND EMERGENCY.
